summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 3.6°C) and outside temperature (down 2.4°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 9%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 13336 lux) and cloud levels (up 798 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 15278 lux), cloud levels (up 1495 m), feels like temperature (up 5.6°C), and outside temperature (up 4.0°C) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; mild and pleasant. Also, pleasant humidity levels. Drizzle or light rain possible, clouds will occasionally block sunlight, and the light is absent. Changeable conditions.
